name: ssinss1d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wss(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wss(c0, c2), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wss(c0, c2), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))

|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

comment: Intersection preserves subclass relationship. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
